keepScrollOnType.name: Keep scroll position when typing
keepScrollOnType.description: Whether the editor should automatically scroll along when you insert or remove a line break or paragraph so that the line with the caret is always in the same position on the screen.

instantSearch.name: Immediately jump to next search match
instantSearch.description: Whether the editor should automatically jump to the position of the next search match when typing in the search bar. If this setting is off, the search will not jump to the next match until the corresponding button or the Enter key are pressed.

minimumIdleMinutes.name: Minimum idle time
minimumIdleMinutes.description: The number of minutes without user input that must pass before the progress tracker will begin a new progress item. Set to 0 to never begin a new progress item until either Skywriter is restarted or a different file is opened.

idleMode.name: Idle mode
idleMode.description: Which idle mode to use for the minimum idle time check.

options.name: Typing
options.description: Default. You're considered idle if you haven't typed anything into the text area for the configured minimum idle time.

options.name: Focus
options.description: You're considered idle if Skywriter does not have the active system focus (e.g. by being in the background) for the configured minimum idle time.

options.name: System
options.description: You're considered idle if your system is idle for the configured minimum idle time. In other words: if you move your mouse or press any key on your keyboard in- or outside Skywriter, you are not idle. Not recommended if you frequently leave Skywriter open in the background (use Focus instead).

dailyReset.name: Daily reset
dailyReset.description: The time of day after which the progress tracker will begin a new day. This is relevant for the display of "words written today". The default is 5 AM.

backupInterval.name: Backup interval
backupInterval.description: The number of seconds that Skywriter will wait between each backup before it will backup the file you are working on. Default is 15 seconds. Set to 0 to disable backups (not recommended).

removeBackupOnSave.name: Remove backup on save
removeBackupOnSave.description: Whether a backup should be automatically removed when you save the document (if one exists).
